snippet.title: Pad of Time - be a time traveler! - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
be a time traveler!

Pad of Time is a classic action-adventure game with a Nintendo 64 aesthetic with a twist! In this
game you’re able to use a time machine to swap between past, present, and future of every level.
Enjoy 4 playable characters and use the time machine to find ancient relics and face though bosses that will be mad at you for being a stranger in their time

Pad of Time is available for Nintendo Wii U eShop and Nintendo Switch eShop!

#NintendoSwitch #eShop #Nindie

-
Hi Humans, I'm Marco and welcome to Markanime, my channel for personal projects ! 

I work as a Game Developer but on my free time I love to make fun animated cartoons and self-published indie games

🎮 I already self-published two games for the Nintendo Wii U and Nintendo Switch: 

- 🪑 El Silla Arcade Edition for Nintendo Wii U in 2019, Feel stressed ? hit someone with a chair !
- ⌚ Pad of Time for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Wii U in 2022 ( Pad of Time is the last Wii U game ! ), the time machine is in your hands 

Both of them available on the Nintendo eShop ;-)

💾 Markanime is also the home of "But it's a flash from 2005", a series to revive the aesthetic from 2005 animations y, So, if you like cartoons and games from the 2000s flash era this is your place!

❤️ Subscribe for more Cartoons & videogames ❤️
Enjoy !
